fields.name: announcement
fields.value: [Command reserved for SomethingRandom] If SomethingRandom finds something worthy to send all of the people in the list, he'll send it using this command!

fields.name: getmultiplekitties [insert number]
fields.value: One kitty isn't enough? You can ask for more! (limit is 16)

fields.name: getsinglekitty
fields.value: returns a kitty pic or gif!

fields.name: help
fields.value: Just sends a giant list of all the commands if you need to read them without their descriptions! (Comes with every Discord bot)

fields.name: joinlist
fields.value: allows you to join the folks who'll get a kitty every 45 minutes!

fields.name: leavelist
fields.value: allows you to leave the list on your own

fields.name: petbot
fields.value: Feel like petting the bot? Do so with this command!

fields.name: pokeyourself
fields.value: Was originally a test function, now is just used to poke yourself if you feel like it

fields.name: postcommands
fields.value: You used this command to read this! Lists out all of kitten bot's commands with a description

fields.name: postlist
fields.value: posts the people in the list of people, use it to make sure you're in it!

fields.name: resetlist
fields.value: [Command reserved for SomethingRandom] Used to reset the list for testing purposes.

fields.name: say
fields.value: If you'd like to speak as the kitten bot, this the command to do it with

fields.name: sendkittenstochina
fields.value: Joke command to send all of Kitten Bot's siblings to China
